p: Korean Red Ginseng is used as traditional medicine in East Asian countries as it has enhanced pharmacological properties as compared with fresh ginseng (the root of Panax ginseng) because of the steaming process against Respiratory syncytial virus, Rhinovirus, Influenza virus, HIV, Hepatitis virus, Norovirus, Rotavirus, Enterovirus, and Coxsackievirus ( Im et al., 2016).
